title: Standard Tenancy Agreement
description: Nigeria-compliant rental agreement template with all necessary clauses for comprehensive landlord and tenant protection. Designed by legal experts to meet Nigerian real estate requirements.
features: Clear terms for rent, deposit, and utilities
bestFor: Landlords renting residential properties, property managers, real estate agents, and tenants wanting to understand standard rental terms.

title: Rent Increase Notice
description: Professional notification template for rent increases compliant with Nigerian tenancy laws. Includes tenant response section and clear communication of terms.
bestFor: Landlords needing to increase rent legally, property managers handling multiple properties, and tenants wanting proper documentation.

title: Property Listing Template
description: Complete property marketing template with all sections needed for effective property presentation, sales, and rental listings.
bestFor: Real estate agents, property owners, property managers, and anyone looking to create professional property listings for sale or rent.

title: Rental Application Form
description: Comprehensive tenant screening application with Nigeria-specific fields for thorough tenant evaluation and background checking.
bestFor: Landlords screening potential tenants, property managers handling multiple applications, and real estate agents assisting clients with tenant selection.

title: Property Inspection Checklist
description: Comprehensive inspection template for move-in/move-out inspections, routine maintenance checks, and property condition assessments.
bestFor: Landlords conducting property inspections, property managers maintaining property conditions, and tenants wanting to document property condition.

title: Maintenance Request Form
description: Professional maintenance request template for tenants to report issues and for landlords to track repairs and maintenance work.
bestFor: Tenants reporting maintenance issues, landlords tracking repair requests, and property managers managing multiple properties.

title: Property Management Agreement
description: Comprehensive property management contract template for landlords hiring property management services in Nigeria.
bestFor: Landlords hiring property managers, property management companies, and real estate professionals offering management services.

title: Moving Checklist & Planner
description: Complete moving timeline and checklist template covering everything from 8 weeks before moving to moving day essentials.
bestFor: Anyone planning a move, tenants changing residences, and real estate agents assisting clients with relocation.
